tooltip.locked: Value is saved and auto-applied. Click to remove saved value and use default settings on load
tooltip.rollback: Roll to the previous coat of arms gallery
tooltip.rollbackEdit: Roll to the previous coat of arms
tooltip.downloadSVG: Download vector image or set of images. Open in browser or load to Map Generator. Size can be set in options
tooltip.downloadPNG: Download as raster image. Size can be set in options
tooltip.downloadJPEG: Download a compressed raster image. Size can be set in options
tooltip.copyEditLink: Copy link to the coat of arms in Edit mode to your clipbard
tooltip.copyApiLink: Copy link to the coat of arms for embedding. Armoria API does not support custom charges
tooltip.copyCoaString: Copy coa object as encoded string to use in Armoria API or in Watabou's Medieval Fantasy City Generator
tooltip.rasterCharge: Upload raster charge (one color, quality loss on scale) from jpg, png or svg image
tooltip.vectorCharge: Upload vector charge (multicolor and lossless scalable) from prepared svg
tooltip.install: Add Armoria application to the desktop or home screen
tooltip.shield: Shield or banner shape. If not set, a random one is selected on reroll
tooltip.gradient: Overlay to be applied on top of coat of arms
tooltip.damasking: Coat of arms pattern also known as diaper
tooltip.gallery: Coat of arms gallery size. Change to smaller value to make coat of arms bigger
tooltip.scale: Downloaded image size, 1 is default size, 2 - 2x size, etc.

error.tinctureRemove: There should be at least 2 colors of each type!
error.notSvgOrText: File must be text or svg!
error.incorrectSvg: File must be prepared svg. Download template for guidance!

success.copyEditLink: Coat of arms link is copied to your clipboard
success.copyApiLink: API link is copied to your clipboard
success.copyCoaString: Encoded COA string is copied to your clipboard

info.tipFromFmg: Configure emblem, save it in SVG format and then load back to the Fantasy Map Generator
info.tipEditControls: Drag to move, hold SHIFT and drag vertically to resize, hold CONTROL and drag horizontally to rotate
info.tipAddTincture: Set color details and chance and then click on 'Apply Color'
info.tipUploadImageSize: Fit image into the rectangle for best result

license.wetaShield: As per my information, shield shape close to the used one is designed for the Lord of the Rings film series by Weta Workshop. The shape itself is drawn by Azgaar, but the design may be owned by Middle-earth Enterprises or New Line Productions. Hereby I recommended not use this shape for any purposes outside of the fair use concept.
